text: Željka Cvijanović (born 4 March 1967), is a Bosnian Serb politician, serving as the 8th and current Serb member of the Presidency of Bosnia and Herzegovina. She was the 9th President of Republika Srpska from 2018 until 2022. She was the 11th Prime Minister of Republika Srpska from 12 March 2013 to 19 November 2018. On 7 October 2018 she was elected to be President of Republika Srpska. Cvijanović is a member of the Alliance of Independent Social Democrats.Zeljka Cvijanovic new Prime Minister of Republic Srpska At the 2022 general election, she became the first woman to be elected member of the Presidency. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Republika Srpska Category:Prime Ministers of Republika Srpska
title: Željka Cvijanović
